name: MEHZ!

screenshots.caption: MEHZ! can be used to measure elements of a website without digging through HTML code.

short_description:
If you’re asking yourself “how big is it?” then MEHZ! is the tool you need!

MEHZ! is a lightweight (it can fit on a floppy disk!) tool that allows you to measure the pixels on your screen without taking a screenshot (or manually counting them). MEHZ! features a simple user interface: all you have to do is drag the mouse to move and size a box around the object you want to measure. Once you’ve done that, MEHZ will tell you the height and width of your selection, and the X and Y coordinates of the upper left corner.
